ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains RxNorm codes associated with Codeine.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are prescribed Codeine.),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNorm codes associated with Codeine are included in the value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-codeine medications are excluded from the value set.)
